qas.question: In what country did the Cathars grow to represent a popular movement?
What was started by the Roman Catholic Church to dispense of the Cathars in Languedoc?
What was a major reason and justification for the Europian wars of religion?
What happened in Spain that led to more heresey?
What fight did the Cathar lead against the Catholic Church?

context: In <a0_0>France<a0_0/> the <b4_0>Cathars<b4_0/> grew to represent a popular mass movement and the belief was spreading to other areas. <a1_0>The <b5_0>Cathar Crusade<b5_0/><a1_0/> was initiated by the Roman Catholic Church to eliminate the Cathar heresy in Languedoc. <a2_0>Heresy<a2_0/> was a major justification for <b3_0>the Inquisition<b3_0/> (Inquisitio Haereticae Pravitatis, Inquiry on Heretical Perversity) and for the <b6_0>European wars of religion<b6_0/> associated with the Protestant Reformation.
